### Relevant Ghanaian policies

The [Right to Information Act (ACT 989)](https://mofep.gov.gh/rti/introduction) which was passed in 2019, promotes transparency and accountability by empowering people to access information on central and local governments as well as non-governmental organizations, which are publicly funded.
